countries.name: USA
countries.info: Known for its diverse culture, advanced technology, and global influence.

countries.name: Canada
countries.info: Famous for its natural beauty, friendly people, and high standard of living.

countries.name: UK
countries.info: Home to rich history, iconic landmarks like Big Ben, and the British royal family.

countries.name: India
countries.info: Known for its vibrant culture, ancient history, and diverse landscapes.

countries.name: Australia
countries.info: Renowned for its unique wildlife, Great Barrier Reef, and laid-back culture.

countries.name: Germany
countries.info: Famous for its engineering, Oktoberfest, and medieval castles.

countries.name: France
countries.info: Known for its world-class art, fashion, and iconic Eiffel Tower.

countries.name: China
countries.info: Known for its ancient culture, Great Wall, and rapid modernization.

countries.name: Japan
countries.info: Famous for its cherry blossoms, technology, and rich cultural traditions.

countries.name: South Korea
countries.info: Known for its pop culture (K-pop), technology, and vibrant cities.

countries.name: Brazil
countries.info: Renowned for its Carnival, Amazon Rainforest, and football culture.

countries.name: Russia
countries.info: Known for its vast landscapes, classical literature, and historical landmarks.

countries.name: Italy
countries.info: Famous for its rich history, art, and cuisine, including pasta and pizza.

countries.name: South Africa
countries.info: Known for its wildlife safaris, natural beauty, and diverse cultures.

countries.name: Mexico
countries.info: Renowned for its vibrant festivals, ancient ruins, and delicious cuisine.

countries.name: New Zealand
countries.info: Famous for its stunning landscapes, Maori culture, and adventure sports.

countries.name: Singapore
countries.info: Known for its modern architecture, clean streets, and diverse cuisine.

countries.name: United Arab Emirates
countries.info: Home to luxury shopping, modern architecture, and the iconic Burj Khalifa.

countries.name: Netherlands
countries.info: Famous for its tulip fields, windmills, and cycling culture.

countries.name: Switzerland
countries.info: Known for its stunning Alps, chocolates, and precision watches.
